sample

Class CreatureCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Card
      • sample.CreatureCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class CreatureCard
extends Card
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Card type: Creature. It contains the health and attack of the creature. It also acts as a controller for the creatureCard.fxml file and so it contains all the features needed to render the card.
